segments.text: Let ’ s go to Wangfujing by bus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Better take the subway . It ’ s faster , and more convenient .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: En , where do we pay the fares ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just go to the ticket office in the subway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to pay an additional fare to change trains ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you don ’ t have to . Here comes the train . Be careful ! Subway doors open and close automatically .
segments.speaker: S2
